projects.title: Ratata
projects.summary: A rhythm game for Windows created in Unity
highlights: Cooperation of four creators of various backgrounds
Created in 48 hours for [Global Game Jam](https://globalgamejam.org/) 2019

projects.title: nbspacer
projects.summary: Replaces spaces in HTML documents with ` ` where appropriate
highlights: Conservative (CVS-friendly) - only modifies the necessary characters
Supports two languages: English and Czech

projects.title: GeoSign
projects.summary: Assists Czech land surveyors in digitally signing documents and sending them to cadastre offices

projects.title: PDF Manipulation Utility
projects.summary: A tool for manipulation with PDF documents
highlights: Can be used to inspect, digitally sign or attach a file

projects.title: missls
highlights: Originally created solo in 48 hours for the game jam [Ludum Dare 32](http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-32/)
Interesting features: minimalistic design, vector graphics, 2D planetary physics

projects.title: Static Analysis Suite
projects.summary: Extension of Clang Static Analyzer with a custom checker
highlights: Feasibility study of replacement of Coverity with Clang Static Analyser

projects.title: Magic Dance Dance Carpet
highlights: Collaboration of five students of various backgrounds
Interesting features: dance pad controls, concave world
